summary: Pup discovers human poachers stealing eggs from his reef. As he leaves the sea to rescue the eggs he'll enter the dangerous world of humans.
cast: Maxwell Vreeland Andrew|Steven Bone|Colin Chong|Chi-Ren Choong|Jason Cottom|Kennie Dowle|Amelia Henderson|Diong Chae Lian|Christina Orow|Ramona Rahman|Tikriti Shabudin|Adila Shakir|Jay Sheldon|Andrew Susay|Mike Swift|Gavin Yap|Brian Zimmerman
title: Un pez fuera del mar
